info.title: Wistiki API v2
info.description: Wistiki API v2 for Wistiki v2+

get.summary: Returns current version, environment and build commit hash

201.description: Successful authentication, returns the user object with an authentication token to be used for later calls

400.description:
Bad Request possible messages:
  • SCHEMA_VALIDATION_FAILED: if request body does not respect the required schema
  • ACCOUNT_NOT_CONFIRMED_ERROR: if account was not yet confirmed
  • BAD_CREDENTIALS_ERROR: invalid email or password
  • DEVICE_UID_REQUIRED: missing x-wistiki-device-uid header

403.description:
Forbidden Request possible messages:
  • SERVICE_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access this endpoint

201.description: Successful authentication, returns the user object with an authentication token to be used for later calls

400.description:
Bad Request possible messages:
  • SCHEMA_VALIDATION_FAILED: if request body does not respect the required schema
  • ACCOUNT_NOT_CONFIRMED_ERROR: if account was not yet confirmed
  • BAD_CREDENTIALS_ERROR: invalid email or password
  • DEVICE_UID_REQUIRED: missing x-wistiki-device-uid header

403.description:
Forbidden Request possible messages:
  • SERVICE_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access this endpoint
  • MODEL_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access the resource model

401.description:
Not Authenticated error. Possible messages:
  • TOKEN_EXPIRED: Provided token has expired
  • USER_NOT_FOUND: user email stored in JWT was not found in DB
  • DEVICE_NOT_ASSOCIATED: Device with uid stored in JWT was not found or is not associated with user

404.description:
Not Found: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND:
  • no user found for this email
  • Device is not associated with user account

Bad Request possible messages:
  • SCHEMA_VALIDATION_FAILED: if request body does not respect the required schema
  • ACCOUNT_NOT_CONFIRMED_ERROR: if account was not yet confirmed

  • DEVICE_UID_REQUIRED: missing x-wistiki-device-uid header

  • MODEL_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access the resource model

404.description: User not found

Bad Request possible messages:
  • OPERATION_NOT_PERMITTED: if user identified by email has already a confirmed account
  • CONFIRMATION_TOKEN_INVALID: if confirmation token mismatch with token stored in DB

get.description: Returns the user Wistiki list, owned and shared. For shared wistikis, it will only show the owner. The friend list will only contain current user infos

get.description: Returns the Wistiki information with the users associated (owner and shares) based on its serial number.

401.description:
Not Authenticated error. Possible messages:
  • TOKEN_EXPIRED: Provided token has expired
  • USER_NOT_FOUND: user email stored in JWT was not found in DB
  • DEVICE_NOT_ASSOCIATED: Device with uid stored in JWT was not found or is not associated with user

403.description:
Forbidden Request possible messages:
  • MODEL_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to create an owner for this wistiki
  • SERVICE_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access this endpoint

404.description: Not Found, Wistiki not found

put.description:
Update a Wistiki data based on its serial number. Data that can be updated:
  • manufacturing_date
  • last_software_version
  • last_software_update
At least one of these data must be provided. Only application and user profiles are allowed to access this endpoint. If profile is user, than check if it has rights to update the Wistiki table

manufacturing_date.description: Date of manufacturing of the Wistiki

400.description:
Bad Request. Possible messages:
  • REQUIRED_DATA_MISSING: When request does not contain an update of at least one of the possible data update attributes

403.description:
Forbidden Request possible messages:
  • MODEL_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to update this wistiki
  • SERVICE_ACL_ERROR: if user/application is not allowed to access this endpoint

401.description:
Not Authenticated error. Possible messages:
  • TOKEN_EXPIRED: Provided token has expired
  • USER_NOT_FOUND: user email stored in JWT was not found in DB
  • DEVICE_NOT_ASSOCIATED: Device with uid stored in JWT was not found or is not associated with user

404.description:
Wistiki not found. Possible messages:
  • NOT_PROVISIONED: When wistiki is not found

post.description: Change the owner of the Wistiki, the previous owner becomes a share of the Wistiki

email.description: The user email used as the id

reset_friends.description: If friends list should be reset default is false

400.description:
OPERATION_NOT_PERMITTED:
  • When user try to transfer a Wistiki to himself

401.description:
Not Authenticated error. Possible messages:
  • TOKEN_EXPIRED: Provided token has expired
  • USER_NOT_FOUND: user email stored in JWT was not found in DB
  • DEVICE_NOT_ASSOCIATED: Device with uid stored in JWT was not found or is not associated with user

403.description:
Forbidden Request possible messages:

  • SERVICE_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access this endpoint

404.description:
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND:
  • User not found
  • Wistiki not found

post.summary: Share the Wistiki with another user
post.description: Share the Wistiki with another user, only the owner can do this

parameters.name: friend
parameters.description: Email of the user to share the Wistikwi with

201.description: Wistiki share success with full details

400.description:
OPERATION_NOT_PERMITTED:

delete.description: Remove the Wistiki sharing with a user identified by its email. Return result depending on if the request client is the owner or a friend

204.description: Wistiki sharing removed with success. This is returned if the request client is a friend and not the owner

Not Authenticated error. Possible messages:

  • DEVICE_NOT_ASSOCIATED: Device with uid stored in JWT was not found or is not associated with user

  • SERVICE_ACL_ERROR: if user is not allowed to access this endpoint

404.description:
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND:
  • Sharing between user and wistiki is not found
  • Wistiki not found

Not Authenticated error. Possible messages:

404.description: Not Found, model identified by given id was not found

status.description: true if version is active, false if inactive

MessageState.description: Message status that indicates if a message was seen by user

read.description: true if message was seen by user

status_date.description: if message has been read by user, this indicates when he read the message

MessageThread.description: Thread to which belongs this message

participants.description: list of user participating in this thread

last_message.description: last message posted to this thread

body.description: Message body, it may be a json stringified when type is Notification

type.description: Message type: Notification if this message is a system notification in which case, body will be a json text

states.description: a list of message state by user that received this message

thread.description: Thread to which this message belong

email.description: The user email used as the id

serial_number.description: Serial number (12 digits) of the Wistiki

mac_address.description: Mac address (17 digits) of the Wistiki

msn.description: Manufacturer Serial Number in hex format

manufacturing_date.description: Date of manufacturing of the Wistiki

last_software_update.description: Date of the last software update of the Wistiki

last_software_version.description: Current software version of the Wistiki

serial_number.description: Serial number (12 digits) of the Wistiki

authentication_key.description: Private authentication key needed to connect to the Wistiki

last_software_update.description: Date of the last software update of the Wistiki

last_software_version.description: Current software version of the Wistiki

id.description: Model id For example Wistiki Voilà is Wistiki 2

commercial_name.description: Commercial name of the product for example Voilà!

icon_url.description: Default icon url for this product

wistiki_alias.description: Alias name given to the wistiki by the owner

is_lost.description: True if wistiki is declared as lost

link_loss.description: True if electronic leash option is activated

inverted_link_loss.description: True if inverted electronic leash is activated

WistikiOwnerDetails.description: Wistiki settings set by the owner

wistiki_alias.description: Alias name given to the wistiki by the owner

wistiki_picture.description: Picture URL of the Wistiki taken by the owner

is_lost.description: True if wistiki is declared as lost

link_loss.description: True if electronic leash option is activated

inverted_link_loss.description: True if inverted electronic leash is activated

ownership_end_date.description: DateTime of ownership transfert. Null if still owner

WistikiFriendDetails.description: Wistiki settings set by the friend

wistiki_alias.description: Alias name given to the wistiki by the owner

wistiki_picture.description: Picture URL of the Wistiki taken by the owner

is_lost.description: True if wistiki is declared as lost

link_loss.description: True if electronic leash option is activated

inverted_link_loss.description: True if inverted electronic leash is activated

share_end_date.description: DateTime of unshare. Null if share is still active

WistikiOwner.description: Object representing all information about Wistiki owner

WistikiFriend.description: Object representing all information about Wistiki friend

UserWistiki.description: Object representing a Wistiki with all related information including owner and friends

serial_number.description: Serial number (12 digits) of the Wistiki

msn_cipher.description: MSN Cipher. Could be in format FF:FF:FF... or FFFFFF...

authentication_key.description: Authentication key. Could be in format FF:FF:FF... or FFFFFF...

last_software_version.description: Wistiki software version in format x.y.z

wistiki_alias.description: Alias name given to the wistiki by the owner
